chapters.title: Prologue: Snow
chapters.info: Melaine, p. 48 (41)—Wise One of the of the Jhirad sept of the Goshien Aiel. She is a Dreamwalker, and was one of Egwene's teachers. She can channel. She swore she would never love a man, but changed her mind later and married Bael, her clan chief, thus becoming sister-wife to Dorindha. She has sun-colored hair and green eyes. She is currently expecting twin daughters, whom she plans to name Min and Egwene. See also Bael.
